languages.text: {n}После долгой, на грани оскорбления, паузы Муаран слегка склоняет голову.{/n} "Я не желаю конфронтации, мон-кай. Мои слова были подобраны без должного тщания".
{n}After a lengthy pause bordering on insult, Muaran inclines his head slightly.{/n} "I do not seek confrontation, mon-keigh. My words were chosen without proper diligence."
languages.original_text: {n}После долгой, на грани оскорбления, паузы Муаран слегка склоняет голову.{/n} "Я не желаю конфронтации, мон-кай. Мои слова были подобраны без должного тщания".

traits.locale_text: {n}After nearly an insultingly long pause, Muaran inclines his head slightly.{/n} "I do not seek confrontation, mon-keigh. My words were chosen without proper diligence."
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: {n}穆兰停顿了很久，近乎侮辱。到了最后，他终于微微侧过了头。{/n}“我不想发生冲突，猴子。我的话确实没有慎重考虑。”
languages.original_text: {n}After a lengthy pause bordering on insult, Muaran inclines his head slightly.{/n} "I do not seek confrontation, mon-keigh. My words were chosen without proper diligence."

traits.locale_text: {n}穆兰停顿了很久，近乎侮辱。到了最后，他终于微微侧过了头。{/n}“我不想发生冲突，猴子。我的话确实没有慎重考虑。”
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: {n}屈辱感に長い沈黙の後、ムアランは頭を少しばかりかしげた。{/n}「私は対立を望んでいない、モン＝ケイ。深く考えずに好きなことを喋っただけだ」
languages.original_text: {n}After a lengthy pause bordering on insult, Muaran inclines his head slightly.{/n} "I do not seek confrontation, mon-keigh. My words were chosen without proper diligence."

traits.locale_text: {n}屈辱感に長い沈黙の後、ムアランは頭を少しばかりかしげた。{/n}「私は対立を望んでいない、モン＝ケイ。深く考えずに好きなことを喋っただけだ」
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: {n}Tras una larga pausa que prácticamente resulta insultante, Muaran inclina ligeramente la cabeza.{/n} «No busco el conflicto, mon-keigh. He elegido mis palabras de forma inadecuada».
languages.original_text: {n}After a lengthy pause bordering on insult, Muaran inclines his head slightly.{/n} "I do not seek confrontation, mon-keigh. My words were chosen without proper diligence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras una larga pausa que prácticamente resulta insultante, Muaran inclina ligeramente la cabeza.{/n} «No busco el conflicto, mon-keigh. He elegido mis palabras de forma inadecuada».
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: {n}Nach einer langen Pause, die schon an eine Beleidigung grenzt, neigt Muaran leicht den Kopf.{/n} "Ich will keine Konfrontation, Chem-Pan-Sey. Meine Worte wurden ohne ausreichende Sorgfalt gewählt."
languages.original_text: {n}After a lengthy pause bordering on insult, Muaran inclines his head slightly.{/n} "I do not seek confrontation, mon-keigh. My words were chosen without proper diligence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einer langen Pause, die schon an eine Beleidigung grenzt, neigt Muaran leicht den Kopf.{/n} "Ich will keine Konfrontation, Chem-Pan-Sey. Meine Worte wurden ohne ausreichende Sorgfalt gwählt."
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: {n}Après une longue pause frisant l'insulte, Muaran incline légèrement la tête.{/n} « Je ne cherche pas la confrontation, mon-keigh. J'admets n'avoir pas fait preuve de diligence en choisissant mes mots. »
languages.original_text: {n}After a lengthy pause bordering on insult, Muaran inclines his head slightly.{/n} "I do not seek confrontation, mon-keigh. My words were chosen without proper diligence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Après une longue pause frisant l'insulte, Muaran incline légèrement la tête.{/n} « Je ne cherche pas la confrontation, mon-keigh. J'admets n'avoir pas fait preuve de diligence en choisissant mes mots. »
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: {n}Neredeyse hakaret sayılacak kadar uzun bir suskunluğun ardından Muaran, başını hafifçe yukarı kaldırıyor.{/n} "Çatışma olsun istemiyorum mon-keigh. Sözlerimi daha dikkatli seçmeliydim."
